label: Odor Elimination Products
description: Products that help eliminate unpleasant odors from various sources.
intents: Get rid of pet urine smell

subcategories.label: Air Fresheners
subcategories.description: Products that emit pleasant scents to mask unpleasant odors.

subcategories.label: Activated Charcoal Products
subcategories.description: Products that use activated charcoal to absorb and eliminate odors.

subcategories.label: Pet Odor Removers
subcategories.description: Products that specifically target and eliminate pet odors.

subcategories.label: Sewage and Effluent Treatment
subcategories.description: Products that treat and eliminate odors from sewage and effluent.

subcategories.label: Refrigerator Odor Eliminators
subcategories.description: Products that eliminate unpleasant odors from refrigerators.
